attributes.action: do more for armed forces in the public/
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do armed forces members get refused entry to clubs and pubs on showing door staff their military ID?

rejection.details:
The title is unclear. If you can clarify e.g 
'Make it an offence to discriminate against military personnel in public places' 
and re-submit it should be accepted.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
